clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in hilum.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 28 mm in diameter.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of hilum.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in hilum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
